name: Makai Crawlers
description:
Ace pilot Tokiko and weapons engineer Rika steal a prototype fighter plane to escape Makai.  Flying it out won’t be so easy, but fortunately it has specially configurable weapons and power systems...

CONTROLS: 

WASD: Accelerate, decelerate, roll

Mouse: Look/steer

Left click: Fire machine guns/cannons (if equipped)

Right click: Fire lasers (if equipped)

C: Hold to look around without steering

HINTS:

Plane weapons and power routing to weapons/systems can be customized before missions; each mission has a different objective, so you can experiment with different combinations
